basic.description: This course is comprised of supervised practicum experiences in a sports science setting. Emphasis is on developing skills and abilities of a strength and conditioning specialist through practical application of knowledge from previous or current course work, while learning new related principles or concepts.
basic.subject: PET
basic.title: Sports Sciences Practicum

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admitted to the Sports Sciences Major of the Master of Science degree in Exercise Science.
